SELECT P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_INFO, P_NO, p_mainimg, stock FROM PROD WHERE P_NO = #{P_NO}
SELECT b_no, b_title, to_char(b_regdate,'YY.MM.DD') as b_regdate, b_type FROM mall_board ORDER BY b_no DESC
SELECT b_no, b_title, b_content, to_char(b_regdate,'YY.MM.DD') as b_regdate, b_type FROM mall_board WHERE b_no = #{b_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall_board (b_no, b_title, b_content, b_type) VALUES (seq_mall_board.nextval, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_type})

INSERT INTO mall_user (u_no, u_id, u_pw, u_name, u_mainaddress, u_subaddress, u_birth, u_phone , u_findpw_question, u_findpw_answer, u_auth) values (seq_mall_user.nextval, #{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_name}, #{u_mainaddress}, #{u_subaddress} ,#{u_birth},#{u_phone},#{u_findpw_question},#{u_findpw_answer},#{u_auth})
mapper.select: SELECT p_no, p_name, to_char(p_price, '999G999G999') AS p_price, p_mainimg, stock FROM prod WHERE p_maintype = #{mainType}
SELECT p_no, p_name, to_char(p_price, '999G999G999') AS p_price, p_mainimg, stock FROM prod WHERE p_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR p_info LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_user SET u_name = #{u_name}, u_mainaddress = #{u_mainaddress}, u_subaddress = #{u_subaddress} , u_phone = #{u_phone}, u_birth = #{u_birth} WHERE u_no = #{u_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall_cart (c_no,u_no, p_no, amount) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(c_no), 0) + 1 FROM mall_cart WHERE u_no = (SELECT u_no FROM mall_user WHERE u_id = #{u_id})) ,(SELECT u_no FROM mall_user WHERE u_id = #{u_id}),#{p_no}, #{amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.c_no, p.p_name, to_char(p.p_price, '999G999G999') AS p_price, c.amount, c.p_no, (SELECT u_no FROM mall_user WHERE u_id = #{u_id}) AS u_no FROM prod p, mall_cart c WHERE p.p_no = c.p_no
SELECT * FROM (SELECT p_no, p_name, to_char(p_price, '999G999G999') AS p_price, p_mainimg, stock FROM prod WHERE p_salecnt >= 100) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100
